title: Ptychodus
summary: "(Since the Battleship is not yet player obtainable, a quote is not available)."
full_text:
Ptychodus
"(Since the Battleship is not yet player obtainable, a quote is not available)."
The Ptychodus is a battleship-class ship of the Megalodon ship line, known for its role in Foralkan fleets. it spawns in after 30 minutes when a stronghold Contested System has a capital shipyard constructed.
Advantages
As a Battleship, it is very powerful and is useful for dealing with NPCs and players.
As a Megalodon line ship, it may have a damage boost like the others. however, turret agility might be there instead since the sunfish has this buff as opposed to a damage buff.
TBA
Disadvantages
Like all Battleships, it is extremely slow.
TBA
Trivia
There are 9 large turrets on the Ptychodus.
This ship isn't player obtainable.
This ship is named after a now currently extinct sharks the Ptychodus
A next-gen screenshot of the Ptychodus
